snippet: Bruce Weber reflects on decades of rooting for the Yankees, from the twilight of the 1960s through the turbulence of Steinbrenner Rex to the end of the Core Four.
abstract: Bruce Weber On Baseball column reflects on decades of rooting for the New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Bruce Weber reflects on decades of rooting for the Yankees, from the twilight of the 1960s through the turbulence of Steinbrenner Rex to the end of the Core Four.

headline.seo: Yankees Fan Looks Ahead, but It’s Not the Same
headline.main: A Monotony of Excellence, an Atrophy of Passion
headline.print_headline: A Monotony of Excellence, An Atrophy of Passion
